scripts.clean: yarn exec make clean && yarn test --clearCache && yarn cache clean
scripts.build: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --verbose run build
scripts.prettify: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --verbose run prettify
scripts.prettify:generated: yarn workspace @objectiv/schema prettify:generated && yarn workspace @objectiv/tracker-core prettify:generated
scripts.tsc: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root  --verbose run tsc
scripts.test: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/schema --exclude @objectiv/utilities  --verbose run test
scripts.test:ci: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/schema --exclude @objectiv/utilities  --verbose run test:ci
scripts.test:coverage: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/schema --exclude @objectiv/utilities  --verbose run test:coverage
scripts.publish: yarn workspaces foreach --exclude root --exclude @objectiv/utilities --verbose exec npm publish
scripts.utils:generate: yarn workspace @objectiv/utilities generate && yarn prettify:generated && yarn tsc
